name: Galini
headline: Compliance guardrails-as-a-service for AI applications
description:
Galini guardrails-as-a-service filter harmful inputs and outputs based on company policies and industry regulations. We make it easy for enterprises to create, test, deploy and refine guardrails.
With Galini, product and engineering leaders enjoy peace of mind knowing their AI apps are compliant at run-time, and save $1-10M in costs from avoiding in-house build
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:compliance; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Shaun Ayrton, Founder, CEO
founders.description: Cofounder and CEO of Galini. Prior to Galini, Shaun was a sr. engagement manager at McKinsey where he drove $500M+ revenue growth for F50 software and telecom companies. He developed the GTM plan from pre launch to $1B in revenue for a conversational AI leader and drove an additional $50M in annual revenue for a regional telco while the industry is declining at 3%, each acquired for ~$20B. He has an MBA from Wharton and a dual degree in computer science and Finance at UPenn (M&T)

founders.name: Raul Zablah, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder and CTO of Galini. Prior to Galini, Raul was a sr. staff engineer at Ridgeline where he built the SRE team from 0 to 10 supporting 10x customer growth in 12 months (reporting to the CTO for a 350 engineer org). Before this, he was the tech lead for the SRE team responsible for $175B AUM investment engine at Bridgewater where he built the team from 0 to 6 and established SRE best practices for an org of 300 engineers. He has a masters in computer science and dual degree from UPenn

generated_description:
### Galini: Compliance Guardrails for AI Applications

#### Company Overview
Galini, founded in 2024, is a pioneering startup located in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator Batch F24. With a compact team of just two employees, Galini is making strides in the realm of AI compliance. Their mission? To provide compliance guardrails-as-a-service specifically designed for AI applications.

#### What They Do
Initially focusing on filtering harmful inputs and outputs, Galini helps enterprises maintain compliance with their company policies and industry regulations. This service is a lifesaver for product and engineering leaders, allowing them to focus on building innovative AI solutions while ensuring they stay within legal and organizational boundaries.

With Galini, businesses can avoid hefty in-house development costs—potentially saving between $1-10 million—by utilizing a well-structured platform that simplifies the creation, testing, and deployment of these crucial guardrails.

#### Core Features
1. **Comprehensive Guardrails Library:** Access to over 100 pre-built guardrails, which can be easily customized.
2. **User-Friendly Interface:** A drag-and-drop feature that allows users to orchestrate guardrails for their specific applications.
3. **Real-Time Monitoring:** Businesses can keep track of usage, latency, and overall performance of their guardrails, ensuring optimal functionality at all times.

#### Target Audience
Galini primarily serves enterprises and AI providers looking for reliable solutions to ensure that their AI applications adhere to compliance standards. This focus is reflected in their robust and scalable offerings.

#### Future Growth
With an emphasis on innovation and efficiency, Galini is well-positioned to disrupt the compliance landscape for AI applications. As they continue to refine their offerings and expand their partnerships—currently over 20—Galini is set to become a trusted ally for organizations navigating the complexities of AI deployment.

For more information, visit their website at [galini.ai](https://www.galini.ai).

#### Contact
Interested in what Galini can do for your business? Reach out to them at contact@galini.ai.
